alert.note: Alert for Lake Of The Woods (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 05 at 2:53AM CDT by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Lake of the Woods County through 330 AM CDT... At 253 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 28 miles west of Angle Inlet to near Birch Beach. Movement was northeast at 60 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Arnesen, Angle Inlet, Lude, Birch Beach, Oak Island, Long Point and Flag Island. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 300 AM CDT for north central and northwestern Minnesota.
